item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Pilgrim (Level 1)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Stamp Collector
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog --date=relative

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 5)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 2)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 1)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.
